Control Number and Name: A.6.2.2: AI system requirements and specification
Instruction: 1. Specify and document all requirements for new AI systems or for material enhancements to existing systems.

Template.text: A.6.2.2 - AI system requirements and specification

Control Number and Name:
A.5.2 AI system impact assessment process
A.5.3 Documentation of AI system impact assessments
A.5.4 Assessing AI system impact on individuals or groups of individuals
A.5.5 Assessing societal impacts of AI systems
Instruction: Determine if the AI system is prohibited or high-risk

Control Number and Name:
A.5.2 AI system impact assessment process
A.5.3 Documentation of AI system impact assessments
A.5.4 Assessing AI system impact on individuals or groups of individuals
A.5.5 Assessing societal impacts of AI systems
Instruction: If the system is regarded as high risk, assess the potential consequences for individuals or groups of individuals, or both, and societies that can result from the AI system throughout its life cycle.

A.5.2 AI system impact assessment process
A.5.3 Documentation of AI system impact assessments
A.5.4 Assessing AI system impact on individuals or groups of individuals
A.5.5 Assessing societal impacts of AI systems
Instruction: Evaluate the potential consequences for individuals or groups of individuals, or both, and societies that can result from the AI system.

Control Number and Name:
A.5.2 AI system impact assessment process
A.5.3 Documentation of AI system impact assessments
A.5.4 Assessing AI system impact on individuals or groups of individuals
A.5.5 Assessing societal impacts of AI systems
A.6.2.2: AI system requirements and specification
Instruction: 1. Specify and document all requirements for new AI systems or for material enhancements to existing systems.

Template.text: A.6.2.2 - AI system requirements and specification

Control Number and Name: A.6.2.3: Design and development of AI systems
Instruction:
1. Design the AI system in accordance with the specified requirements.
2. Involve individuals with competence in the AI system’s intended domain in the design process.

Template.text: A.6.2.3 - Design and development of AI systems

Control Number and Name:
A.6.3.1: Data acquisition
A.6.3.2: Data preparation
Instruction:
1. Acquire data for training, validation and testing in accordance with the AI system requirements and data-related considerations.
2. Verify the data against the data requirements.
3. Prepare the data for use in training, validation and testing.

Template.text:
A.6.3.1 - Data acquisition
A.6.3.2 - Data preparation

Instruction:
1. Select appropriate model architectures, algorithms and methods for the AI system.
2. Train the model using the prepared data.

Control Number and Name:
A.6.3.4: Verification of AI systems
A.6.3.5: Validation of AI systems
Instruction:
1. Verify that the outputs of the model meet the specified requirements.
2. Validate that the AI system meets its intended use and the specified requirements.

Template.text:
A.6.3.4 - Verification of AI systems
A.6.3.5 - Validation of AI systems

Instruction: Deploy the AI system to the production environment in accordance with the deployment plan.

Control Number and Name: A.6.3.7: Operation and monitoring of AI systems
Instruction:
1. Operate and monitor the AI system in accordance with the specified requirements and procedures.
2. Collect and analyze data on the performance of the AI system.

Template.text: A.6.3.7 - Operation and monitoring of AI systems
